channel.title: Emote?
channel.description:
when i have added the hitpoint skillcape emote i can't seem to find the emote id for the gfx... when i am doing the gfx the character are doing the fletching emote?
[IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt292/kneistol/Skjermdump-6.png[/img]
will anybody help me find the hitpoint emote id so it will do the same thing as the gfx?
